title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not actually do anything. I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame).
OB: When the Help view is launched, pressing the tab key does not have any effect.
EB: Pressing the tab key in the Help view should navigate through the interactive elements without requiring a prior click on a 'live' area.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Launch the Help view.
2. Attempt to navigate using the tab key.
3. Observe that the tab key does not navigate through the interactive elements.
4. Click on one of the 'live' areas, such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame.
5. Attempt to navigate using the tab key again.
6. Observe that the tab key now successfully navigates through the interactive elements.
